body_html:
@soumith thanks! But we currently have issue after installing pytorch. If I will try to import caffe2.python raises exception

>>> from caffe2.python import core
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "path_to_lib/pytorch/caffe2/python/__init__.py", line 2, in <module>
   from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2
ImportError: cannot import name 'caffe2_pb2'

Is it bug or documentation is outdated?

To reproduce this issue, you need to build pytorch from sources

body:
@soumith thanks! But we currently have issue after installing pytorch. If I will try to import caffe2.python raises exception
```
>>> from caffe2.python import core
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "path_to_lib/pytorch/caffe2/python/__init__.py", line 2, in <module>
   from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2
ImportError: cannot import name 'caffe2_pb2'
```

Is it bug or documentation is outdated? 

To reproduce this issue, you need to build pytorch from sources
